item.title: How i created my blog in 30 minutes
item.description: Creating a simple blog with hugo Seems like everyone today has a blog, a vlog and a podcast. This post will give you a hands on explanation on how to create your blog in 5 minutes, and deploy it on Github pages. Steps Create the repo To keep things simple, we will create a github pages repository. For a more detailed instruction visit this link First, go to github and create a new repository with your name.
